description.value:
Recipe Price 200 sp
Ingredients 6 basic, 2 special
Preparation DC 24 Cooking Lore, DC 26 Survival
Requirements Improved Kitchen plus Magical or Alchemical Crafting OR Magic Kitchen
Favorite Meal As a favorite meal, you can move your full speed while you perform these checks.

The Orange Inn Tarts are local delicacies of Rodenia City, made popular by the heritage inn sharing its name. These are cup-sized custard tarts that are garnished with orange shavings, and features a half-slice of orange baked inside it. While variants of this dish exist - particularly non magical ones - the prime example of the Orange Inn Tart will have the citrus taste only exist in the garnish as an aftertaste, while the orange piece melts in a sweet, gooey goodness amongst the custard instead of having its tart sourness, much like a wellbaked apple pie.

Once consumed, an Orange Inn Tart bestows a +1 item bonus to checks when one is taking the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.TiNDYUGlMmxzxBYU]{Search} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EwgTZBWsc8qKaViP]{Investigate} exploration activities, or increase an existing item bonus by the same amount.

@UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.equipment.7OJcFeTWQTWlQHgv]{Effect: Orange Inn Tart}
